anya-e1212n:309_0: Aggismā sissa ni hoti vā-aggini. Aggi, aggayo, aggī.
anya-e1212n:311_0: Isismā sissa ṭe vā hoti-ise, isi-brahmādittā gasse vā-(bho)ise isi isī.
anya-e1212n:313_0: Isasmā parassa dutiyā yossa ṭe vā hoti- ise, isayo, isi,
anya-e1212n:314_0: Ratyādīhi smino ṭo hoti vā-ādo, ādimhi, ādismiṃ. Samāse ikārantato yosmiṃsu viseso.
anya-e1212n:316_0: Aññapadatthe vattamānā ikārantato nāmasmā yonaṃ no ne vā honti yathākkamaṃ pulliṅge-
anya-e1212n:318_0: Aññapadatthe vattamānā ikārantato nāmasmā smino ne hoti vā kvaci-
anya-e1212n:318_4: “kvacī“ti vuttattā yathādassanaṃ na sabbatta ne ādeso.
anya-e1212n:322_0: Jhasaññito yonaṃ nonevāhonti yathākkamaṃ pulliṅge. Daddhino.
anya-e1212n:324_0: Jantuhetuhi īkārantehi ghapasaññehi ca paresaṃ yonaṃ vā lopo hoti- daddhī, daddhiyo-
anya-e1212n:326_0: Jhasaññito aṃvacanassa naṃ vā hoti-daṇḍinaṃ, daṇḍiṃ, daṇḍine.
anya-e1212n:328_0: Jhito yonaṃ no vā hoti pulliṅgehi dutiyā yossa no daṇḍino, daṇḍi, daṇḍinā, daṇḍīhi, daṇḍībhi-daṇḍino, daṇḍissa, daṇḍinaṃ-daṇḍinā, daṇḍimhā, daṇḍismā.
anya-e1212n:330_0: Jhito smiṃvacanassa ni hoti vā- daṇḍini. Daṇḍimhi,
anya-e1212n:334_0: Lato yonaṃ vo hoti vā pulliṅge.

anya-e1212n:593_0: Vibhattiyā tato bhedo saliṅgānaṃ bhave tathā tumhādinaṃ tvaliṅgesu nevatthi pādivādinaṃ.
anya-e1212n:595_4: upa kuma asa iti ṭhite “aviggabho niccasamāso padantaraviggaho ve”ti samīpaṃ kumbhasseti padantaraciggahe-
anya-e1212n:596_0: Asaṅkhyaṃ vibhatti sampatti samipa sākalyāhāva yathāpacchā yugapadatthe.
anya-e1212n:601_0: Amādekatthā pubbaṃ yadekatthamakārantaṃ tato parāsaṃ sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopo na hoti aṃtu bhavatyapañcamiyā-
anya-e1212n:603_0: Amādekatthā pubbaṃ yadekatthamakārantaṃ tato parāsaṃ tatiyā sattamīnaṃ aṃ hoti vā-
anya-e1212n:605_0: Amādi syādyantaṃ syādyantena saha bahulamekatthaṃ hoti-
anya-e1212n:605_15: iha pana vutti padenevopasittādi kriyāyākhyāpanato na tatthāyuttatthatā-
anya-e1212n:605_26: bahulādhikārā ntamānaniddhāriyapuraṇa bhāvati bhāvati ttatthehi nahoti-
anya-e1212n:605_36: brāhmaṇassa kaṇhā dantā iccatra dantāpekkhā chaṭṭhiti kaṇhenasambandhābhāvā na samāso-
anya-e1212n:605_37: aññamaññasambandhānaṃhi samāsoyadā tu kaṇhā ca te dantā ceti visesanasmāso tadā chaṭṭhi kaṇhadantāpekkāti brāhmaṇakaṇhadantāti hoteva-
anya-e1212n:605_38: rañño māgadhassa dhanamiccatra raññoti chaṭṭhi dhanamapekkhate na māgadhaṃ rājā eva māgadhasadadena vuccateti
anya-e1212n:605_39: bhedābhāvā sambandhābhāvoti tulyādhikaraṇena māgadhena saha rājā na samasyate-
anya-e1212n:605_40: rañño asso ca puriso cāti ettha rañño asso purisoti ca paccekaṃ sambandhato sāpekkatāya na samāso-
anya-e1212n:605_41: asso ca puriso cāti catthasamāse kate tu rājassapurisāti hotevaññānapekkhattā-
anya-e1212n:605_42: rañño garuputtoti ettha pana rājāpekkhinopi garuno puttena saha samāso gamakattā-
anya-e1212n:607_0: Visesanaṃ syādyantaṃ vasessena syādyantena samānādhikāraṇena sahekatthaṃ hoti-
anya-e1212n:607_7: muni ca so sīho cāti munisīho-
anya-e1212n:607_9: sīhoti vutte upacaritānupacaritasīhānaṃ sāmaññappatītiyaṃ munisaddo viseseti-
anya-e1212n:607_12: mahanti ca sā saddhā cāti samāse kate-
anya-e1212n:611_4: brāhmaṇa añño brāhmaṇantānajjhāsino khattiyādi brāhmaṇa sadisoyeva abrāhmaṇeti vutte patiyate-
anya-e1212n:611_5: itarasmiṃ pana pakkhe kenaci saṃsayanimittena khattiyādo brāhmaṇeti pavantassa micchāñāṇanivutti karīyati-
anya-e1212n:611_6: brāhmaṇe yaṃ’na bhavati brāhmaṇeti brāhmaṇantajjhāsito na bhavatīti attho-
anya-e1212n:611_7: tattha vinā sadisattaṃ micchāñāṇasambhavā payogasāmatthiyā ca sadisapaṭippatti taggatāca liṅgasaṅkhyā bhavanti-
anya-e1212n:611_8: atoyevoccate nañivayutta maññasadisādhikaraṇe tathā hi atthasampaccayoti-
anya-e1212n:613_0: Sarādo uttarapade nañsaddassa ana hotīti nassa ana.
anya-e1212n:615_0: Kusaddo pādayo ca syādyantena sahekatthā honti niccaṃ syādividhivisayato’ññattha-
anya-e1212n:617_0: Pagato ācariyo pācariyo-evaṃ pantevāsī-suṭṭhukataṃ sukataṃ-kicchena kataṃ dukkataṃ.
anya-e1212n:621_0: Antabhutassāppadhānassa ghapassa syādisu rasso hotīti rasso.
anya-e1212n:629_0: Anekaṃ syādyanta maññassa padassatthe ekatthaṃ vā hoti-o tiṇṇo haṃso yaṃ so otiṇṇahaṃso-(jalāsayo).
anya-e1212n:630_2: jinnotaru yena so chinnataru(pharasu)dinno suṅko yassaso dinnasuṅko(rājā)-
anya-e1212n:630_3: apagataṃ kālakaṃ yasmā so apagatakālako (paṭo)pahutaṃ dhanaṃ yassa so pahutadhano- (puriso)-
anya-e1212n:632_0: Antabhutassāppadhānassa gossa syādīsu u hoti- cittagu- (gomā)-
anya-e1212n:632_2: (vanaṃ) saha puttena vattamāno saputto saha putto vā-
anya-e1212n:632_4: dhavā ca badirā ca palāsā ceti viggahe.
anya-e1212n:634_0: Anekaṃ syādyantaṃ catthe ekatthaṃ vā bhavati-
anya-e1212n:634_1: samuccayo’nvāvayo itarītarayogo samāhāro ceti catatāro catthā-
anya-e1212n:634_2: tattha itarītarayoge samāhāre ca ekatthībhāvo sambhavati padānaṃ aññamaññasambandhato-
anya-e1212n:636_0: Catthe samāhāre yadekatthaṃ taṃ napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ bhavati-
anya-e1212n:636_7: samāse yaṃ pubbaṃ vūttaṃ tadeva pubbaṃ nipatati-
anya-e1212n:636_11: pāpā bhumi yasmiṃ pāpā ca sābhumi ceti vā viggayha samāse samāsantveccādhikāro.
anya-e1212n:638_0: Pāpādīhi parā yā bhumi tassā samāsanto a hoti-
anya-e1212n:640_0: Saṅkhyāhi parā yā bhumi tassā samāsanto ahoti-
anya-e1212n:642_0: Dīghādīhi asaṅkhyehi saṅkhyāhi ca parasmā rattisaddā anaññāsaṅkhyatthesu samasitā samāsanto a hoti-
anya-e1212n:642_1: dīghā ca sā ratti cāti dīgharattaṃ-
anya-e1212n:642_5: pubbā ca sā ratti cātī pubbarattaṃ-
anya-e1212n:644_0: Gosaddā alopacisayā samāsanto a hoti na ce catthe
anya-e1212n:645_8: “tena kataṃ kīta”miccādinā ṇike “lopo”ti tassa lope ca kane “gossuti ukāro-
anya-e1212n:646_0: Pubbuttarobhayaññatthamiccekatthaṃ catubbidhaṃ visessaññobhayatthatā tidhā vakkhanti taṃ pare.
anya-e1212n:650_0: Itthiyaṃ vattamānato akārantato nāmasmā āppaccayo hoti-devadattā, ajā, kokilā, iccādi.
anya-e1212n:652_1: nadādīhi itthiyaṃ ṅīppaccayo hoti ṅakāro “ntantunaṃ ṅimhi to ve”ti saṅketattho- nadī, mahī, kumārī, taruṇi, vāruṇi, gotamī,
anya-e1212n:652_3: “ntantunaṃ ṅimhi to ve”ti vā takāre- gacchatī- gacchatī-
anya-e1212n:652_5: “gotovā“ti nadādisu pāṭhā vā ṅīmhi “gossāvaṅa”ti gosaddassa āvaṅa- gāvī, go.
anya-e1212n:656_0: Itthiyamivaṇṇuvaṇṇantehi nī hoti bahulaṃ-payatapāṇinī, daṇḍinī, bhikkhunī, paracittavidunī.
anya-e1212n:664_0: Sarānamādibhuta ye akārivaṇṇavaṇṇā tesaṃ ā e o honti yathākkamaṃ ṇanubandheti akārassa akāro.
anya-e1212n:674_0: Vacchādito gottādibhutā gaṇato ca ṇana ṇayanappaccayā honti paputtādo’pacce-
anya-e1212n:677_0: Kattikādīhi vidhavādīhi ca ṇeyyaṇerā vā yathākkamaṃ,
anya-e1212n:681_0: Sarānamādibhutā ye ayuvaṇṇā tesaṃ ā e o honti kvaci deva saṃyogavisaye ṇanubandheti visayasattamiyā niddiṭṭhattā saṃyogato pubbeva ekāro.
anya-e1212n:685_0: Yakārādo paccaye gossuvaṇṇassa ca avaṅa hotīti ukārassa avaṅa.
anya-e1212n:687_4: te neva vasiṭṭhassāpaccaṃ vāsiṭṭho tveva hoti.
anya-e1212n:689_0: Rājasaddato ñño vā hotapacce jātiyaṃ gammamānāyaṃ-rañño apaccaṃ rājañño-jātiyanti kiṃ?-Rājāpaccaṃ.
anya-e1212n:691_0: Khattasaddā yeyā hontapacce jātiyaṃ-khattassāpaccaṃ khattyo, khattiyo-jātiyantveva-khatti.
anya-e1212n:693_0: Manusaddato jātiyaṃ ssa saṇa hotapacce-makanuno apaccaṃ manusso, mānuso-jātiyantveva-mānavo.
anya-e1212n:695_1: tannāmasmā khattiyāpacce raññe ca ṇe hoti-
anya-e1212n:695_2: pañcālānaṃ apaccaṃ rājā vā pañcālo, māgadho-
anya-e1212n:697_0: Kurusivīhapacce raññe ca ṇyo hoti-kurunaṃ apaccaṃ rājāvā korabbo, sebbo.
anya-e1212n:699_3: idha kasmā na hoti’ nīlaṃ pītanti?
anya-e1212n:701_0: Tatiyattato nakkhattā tena lakkhite kāle ṇe hoti tañce nakkhattaminduyuttaṃ hoti-
anya-e1212n:703_0: Seti paṭhamantā asseti chaṭṭhatthe ṇe hoti yaṃ paṭhamantaṃ sā dve devatā puṇṇamāsī vā-
anya-e1212n:703_1: sugato devatā asseti sogato- māhindo, yāmo, cāruṇo-
anya-e1212n:706_0: Dutiyantato tamadhīte tañjānātīti etesvattesu ṇehoti koṇiko ca-
anya-e1212n:706_2: katayādesassikārassa“tadā desā tadiva bhavanti“ti ñāyā sarānamaccādinā ekāre yāgamadvittāni- ke- kamako, padako- ṇike-
anya-e1212n:710_0: Purā iccetasmā bhavatthe ṇe hoti tano va-purā bhavo purāṇe, purātano.
anya-e1212n:712_0: Amā saddato acco hoti bhavatthe-amā bhavo amacco.
anya-e1212n:716_0: Sattamyantā ete paccayā honti bahulaṃ bhavatthe- kaṇa-
anya-e1212n:716_5: “ṇiko”ti sattamyantā bhavatthe ṇiko hoti sarade bhāvo sāradiko,
anya-e1212n:718_0: Paṭhamantā sippādivācakā asseti chaṭṭhatthe ṇiko hoti-
anya-e1212n:718_5: sataṃ payojanamassa sātikaṃ“taṃhantārahati gacchatuñchaticarati”ti dutiyantā bhanticcevamādisavatthesu ṇiko hoti-
anya-e1212n:718_12: “tena kataṃ kītaṃ baddhamabhiyaṅkhataṃ kasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ hataṃ hanti jitaṃ jayati dibbati khanati tarati carati
anya-e1212n:718_13: vahati jīvati”ti tatiyantā katādisvatthesu ṇiko hoti-
anya-e1212n:718_24: iha nabhavati “aṅguliyā khantī”ti anabhidhānā abhidhānalakkhaṇa hi tabbādi ṇadisamāsā-
anya-e1212n:720_0: Pañcamyantā sambhu tamāgatanti etesvatthesuṇiko hoti-mātito sambhutamāgataṃ vā mattikaṃ, pettikaṃ.
anya-e1212n:729_0: Anto saro ādi yassāvayavassa tassa lopo hoti rānubandheti ulopo-pitu bhātā petteyyo.
anya-e1212n:731_0: Mātuto ce pituto ca tesaṃ bhaginiyaṃ cho hoti-mātubhagini mātucchā-“itthiyamatvā”ti ā-evampitucchā.
anya-e1212n:735_0: Mātāpitūhi hite reyyaṇa hoti-mātu hito matteyyo, pitu hito petteyyo.
anya-e1212n:737_0: Paṭhamantā asseti asmiṃ atthe ṇiko hoti kova tañce paṭhamantaṃ parimāṇambhavati.
anya-e1212n:738_0: Doṇe parimāṇamassa doṇiko, (vīhi)-ekamparimāṇamassa ekakaṃ-dvikaṃ, tikaṃ, catukkaṃ, pañcakamiccādi.
anya-e1212n:740_0: Tārakādihi paṭhamantehi asseti chaṭṭhatthe ito hoti te
anya-e1212n:741_0: Ce sañjātā honti-tārakā sañjātā assa tārakitaṃ-(gaganaṃ)-pupchito-(rukkho).
anya-e1212n:743_0: Paṭhamantā mānavuttito asseti asmiṃ atthe matto hoti-
anya-e1212n:745_0: Purisā paṭhamantā uddhamānavuttito asseti asmiṃ atthe ṇe hoti matta tagghā ca-
anya-e1212n:746_0: Tassa bhāvakammesu tta tā ttanaṇyaṇeyya ṇigha ṇiyā.
anya-e1212n:747_0: Bhavanti etasmā saddabuddhīti bhāvo saddappavatti nimittaṃ-
anya-e1212n:747_2: chaṭāṭhiyantā bhāve kamme ca tta tādayo honti bahulaṃ-
anya-e1212n:747_3: sāmaññavidhayo payogamanusārayantiti kuto ci dvīsukuto ci bhāve yeva-
anya-e1212n:747_4: na ca sabbe sabbato honti aññatra ttatāhi-
anya-e1212n:747_5: nīlassa paṭāssa bhāvo nīlattaṃ nīlatāti guṇe bhāvo-
anya-e1212n:747_6: iha guṇavasā nilasaddonīlaguṇayutte dabbe vattate nimittassarupānugatāñcabuddhi-
anya-e1212n:747_7: evamaññatrāpi yathānurūpaṃñātabbaṃ nīlassaguṇassa bhāvo nīlattaṃnīlatāti nīlaguṇajāti-
anya-e1212n:747_13: alasassa bhāvo kammaṃ vā alasattaṃ alasatā- ttana,
anya-e1212n:747_16: akiñcanameva ākiñcaññaṃ- ṇeyya, soceyyaṃ- ṇa, pāṭavaṃ- avaṅa- iya, naggiyaṃ- ṇi ya,
anya-e1212n:750_0: Tassa vikārāvayavesu ṇa ṇika ṇeyya mayā.
anya-e1212n:751_1: chaṭṭhiyantā nāmasmā vikāre’vayave ca ṇadayo honti bahulaṃ- ṇa,
anya-e1212n:756_0: Ekasmā asahāyatthe ka ākī honti-eko’va ekako, ekākī.
anya-e1212n:758_0: Upadvitīhi avayavavuttīhi paṭhamantehi asseti chaṭṭhatthe ayo hoti-
anya-e1212n:758_1: ubho aṃsā assa ubhayaṃ. Dvayaṃ. Tayaṃ-
anya-e1212n:758_3: “catutthadutiyesvesaṃ tatiyapaṭhamā”ti nipātanā pūraṇatthe dvito tiyo dvissa du ca ticatuhi atiyattāca- dutiyo. Tatiyo. Catuttho.
anya-e1212n:760_0: Chaṭṭhiyantāya pañcādikāya saṅkhyāya katismā ca mo hoti pūraṇatthe-
anya-e1212n:762_0: Chasaddā ṭṭha ṭṭhamā honti puraṇatthe-channaṃ pūraṇe chaṭṭho, chaṭṭhamo vā.
anya-e1212n:764_0: Chaṭṭhiyantāyekādasādikāya saṅkhyāya ḍo hoti pūraṇatthe vibhāsā-
anya-e1212n:766_0: Se pare satyantassa tikārassa lopo hotīti tilopo. Ekunavīso.
anya-e1212n:768_0: Satādikāya saṅkhyāya chaṭṭhiyantāya puranatthe mo hoti satā dinami cāntādeso-
anya-e1212n:768_3: Vīsati adhikā asmiṃ sate sahasse vāti evamādiviggahe.
anya-e1212n:770_0: Satyantāya mutyantāya īsantāya āsantāya dasantāya ca saṅkhyāya paṭhamantāya asminti sattamyatthe ḍo hoti
anya-e1212n:770_1: sā ce saṅkhyā adhikā hoti yadasminti tañce sataṃ sahassaṃ satasahassaṃ vā hoti- tilope- vīsaṃ- sataṃ, sahassaṃ,
anya-e1212n:770_6: satasahassaṃ vā- āsantāya- paññāsaṃ- sataṃ, sahassaṃ.
anya-e1212n:772_0: Paṭhamantā ettha assa atthīti etesvatthesu mantu hoti-
anya-e1212n:772_1: itisaddassa vivakkhāniyamanatthattā pahutādiyutteyeva atthyatthe hoti- vuttaṃhi.
anya-e1212n:775_0: Pahutā gāvo ettha dese assa vā purisassa santīti sagomāpasaṃsāyaṃ.
anya-e1212n:775_1: Pasatthā jāti assa atthīti jātimā- nindāyaṃ,
anya-e1212n:777_0: Paṭhamantato avaṇṇantā mantvatthe vantu hoti-sīlavā, dayāvā-avaṇṇāti kiṃ? Buddhimā.
anya-e1212n:779_0: Daṇḍādīhi ika ī honti vā mantvatthe- daṇḍiko, daṇḍī-
anya-e1212n:779_2: itisaddassa visasaniyamantthattā kuto ci dve kutoce kamekaṃva- nāviko, sukhī.
anya-e1212n:781_0: Tapādito vā ssī hoti mantvatthe-tapassī, yasassī-vātveca-yasavā.
anya-e1212n:787_3: “ito tetto kuto”ti imassa ṭi nipaccate etassa ṭaeta kassa kuttañca-
anya-e1212n:789_0: Abhiādīhi to hoti-apañcamyantehipi vidhānatto’yaṃ-abhito, parito, pacchato, heṭṭhato.
anya-e1212n:791_0: Ādippabhutīhi to hoti-ādo ādito, majjhe majjhato, yaṃ yato.
anya-e1212n:795_0: Ete saddā nipaccante-kasmiṃ kattha, kutra, kva-etasmiṃ ettha, atra-asmiṃ iha, idha.
anya-e1212n:801_0: Sattamyantā tato vāhaṃ hoti hiñca-tahaṃ, tahiṃ-vātveva-tatra.
anya-e1212n:803_0: Kiṃsaddā sattamyantā hiṃ haṃ nipaccante kissa kukā ca-kuhiṃ kahaṃ-sabbasmiṃ kāleccevamādi viggahe.
anya-e1212n:805_0: Etehi sattamyantehi kāle dā hoti-sabbadā ekadā, aññadā, yadā, tadā.
anya-e1212n:807_0: Ete saddā nipaccante-kasmiṃ kāle kadā, kudā-sabbasmiṃ kāle sadā-imasmiṃ kāle adhunā, idāni.
anya-e1212n:810_0: Pakati paccayo ādeso kālavisesoti sabbametaṃ nipātanā labbhati-
anya-e1212n:814_0: Ete saddā nipaccante pakāreti kimimehi thaṃpaccayoketa tesaṃ yathākkamaṃ-
anya-e1212n:815_0: Ekena pakārena ekaṃ vā pakāraṃ karoticcevamādiviggahe.
anya-e1212n:819_0: Ekasmā pakāre jjhaṃ vā hoti-ekajjhaṃ-vāti kiṃ, ekadhā.
anya-e1212n:821_0: Dvitīhi pakāre edhā vā hoti-medhā, tedhā-vātveva-dvidhā, tidhā-ekaṃ vāraṃ bhuñjaticcevamādiviggahe.
anya-e1212n:823_0: Vārasambandhitiyā katisaṅkhyāya kkhattuṃ hoti-kativāre bhujati katikkhattuṃ bhuñjati.
anya-e1212n:825_0: Vārasambandhiniyā bahusaṅkhyāya dhā hoti kkhattuñca vārānañce paccāsatti hoti-
anya-e1212n:825_1: bahuvāre buñjati bahudhā vā divasassa buñjati,
anya-e1212n:827_0: Ekaṃ vāramiccasmiṃ atthe sakinti vā nipaccate ekasmā kiṃ ekassa ca sādeso-
anya-e1212n:827_1: ekaṃ vāraṃ bhuñjati sakiṃ bhuñjati- vāti kiṃ,
anya-e1212n:829_0: Kriyāya guṇena dabbena vā bhinne atthe vyāpitumicchā vīcchāvīcchāyampakāre ca so hoti bahulaṃ-
anya-e1212n:829_1: sāmaññaniddesā yathāsambhavaṃ vibhattyantā yato kuto visaddā hoti-
anya-e1212n:831_0: Avatthāvato’vatthantarenābhutassa tāyāvatthāya bhāve karāsabhūhi sambandhe sati vakāravācakācī hoti-
anya-e1212n:831_3: adhavalo dhavalo siyā bhavati vā dhavalīsiyā.
anya-e1212n:833_3: tatta yasmiṃ kriyatthe kattuvācini kammaṃ gavesīyate,
anya-e1212n:833_5: tesu yathārahaṃ sakamma kato kammādo kārake kammāvacanicchāyambhāve ca tabbādayo veditabbā-
anya-e1212n:833_6: akammakato pana bhāvo kammavajjite ca kārake-
anya-e1212n:833_7: kriyāti ca gamanapacanādiko asattasammato kattarī kammevā patiṭṭhito kārakasamūhasādhiyo padattho vuccati, vuttaṃhi.
anya-e1212n:836_0: Kara karaṇe-akāro uccāraṇattho-evamuttaratrāpi-kariti ṭhite-bahulamiti sabbattha vattate.
anya-e1212n:838_0: Tabbaaniyā kriyatthā pare bhāvakammesu bahulaṃ bhavanti-
anya-e1212n:840_0: Tumādisu paccayesu vā karassa ā hoti-aññatra.
anya-e1212n:842_0: Kriyatthānamantabyañjanassa pararūpaṃ hoti yakārato’ññasmiṃ byañjanādo paccayeti pararūpaṃ-
